elements.name: Create a new recurring (3 days a week) meeting, and make sure it doesn't repeat on successive days

steps.name: I have launched the Calender App
the "15-03-2021" day is not a non working day
the "3" days a week meeting is not repeated on successive days for the days "tuesday thursday saturday"
I want to book a meeting with the title "Recurring-Team Catch Up"
the "start" time hour as "6" and minutes as "00"
the "end" time hour as "7" and minutes as "15"
I invite "2" and they are "deepak4all@gmail.com v_malini@rocketmail.com"
I save the meeting
I check if the meeting with title "Recurring-Team Catch Up" is created on "16 March 2021,6 April 2021" as expected
